caption.title: Characteristics of the Hong Kong (HK) influenza epidemics.
caption.p: Each column shows the distributions of peak magnitude (1 st row), epidemic duration (2 nd row), and time from the onset to the peak (3 rd row) for each strain/subtype or all strains combined. The last column also shows the corresponding epidemic characteristic observed in New York City (NYC) for comparison.
Click here for additional data file.
